com.bandyer.android_sdk.intent

Class Builder.ChatIntentBuilder

  • Builder
    • com.bandyer.android_sdk.intent.BandyerIntent.Builder.ChatIntentBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    BandyerIntent.Builder

    public static class Builder.ChatIntentBuilder
extends Builder

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.bandyer.android_sdk.intent.BandyerIntent.Builder

        Builder.CallIntentBuilder, Builder.ChatIntentBuilder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChatIntentBuilder(android.content.Context context) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Builder.ChatIntentBuilder newTask()
      Create intent with NEW_TASK flag active to be used if starting context is application context or coming from services or receivers.
      Builder.ChatIntentBuilder withAudioCallCapability(boolean upgradable)
      Audio call capability means that you can initialize an audio call from chat activity. If upgradable is true it means that the call will be initialized as audio call but will be upgraded if selected camera button from call action items.
      Builder.ChatIntentBuilder withAudioVideoCallCapability()
      Audio video call capability means that you can initialize a video call from chat activity.
      Builder.ChatIntentBuilder withUserAlias(java.lang.String userAlias)
      A valid user alias is needed by Bandyer SDK to retrieve the user to chat with.
      Builder.ChatIntentBuilder withUserDisplayFormatter(com.bandyer.android_common.fetcher.UserDisplayInfoFormatter formatter)
      The display info formatter is used to format user info from user fetcher. If no formatter is provided a base instance of formatter will be used.

      • Methods inherited from class com.bandyer.android_sdk.intent.BandyerIntent.Builder

        build, startWithCall, startWithChat

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatIntentBuilder

        public ChatIntentBuilder(android.content.Context context)

    • Method Detail

      • withAudioCallCapability

        public Builder.ChatIntentBuilder withAudioCallCapability(boolean upgradable)

        Audio call capability means that you can initialize an audio call from chat activity. If upgradable is true it means that the call will be initialized as audio call but will be upgraded if selected camera button from call action items.

        Parameters:
        upgradable - Boolean
        Returns:
        ChatIntentBuilder

      • withAudioVideoCallCapability

        public Builder.ChatIntentBuilder withAudioVideoCallCapability()

        Audio video call capability means that you can initialize a video call from chat activity.

        Returns:
        ChatIntentBuilder

      • withUserAlias

        public Builder.ChatIntentBuilder withUserAlias(java.lang.String userAlias)

        A valid user alias is needed by Bandyer SDK to retrieve the user to chat with.

        Parameters:
        userAlias - String
        Returns:
        ChatIntentBuilder

      • withUserDisplayFormatter

        public Builder.ChatIntentBuilder withUserDisplayFormatter(com.bandyer.android_common.fetcher.UserDisplayInfoFormatter formatter)

        The display info formatter is used to format user info from user fetcher. If no formatter is provided a base instance of formatter will be used.

        Parameters:
        formatter - UserDisplayInfoFormatter
        Returns:
        CallIntentBuilder

      • newTask

        public Builder.ChatIntentBuilder newTask()

        Create intent with NEW_TASK flag active to be used if starting context is application context or coming from services or receivers.

        Returns:
        CallIntentBuilder
